subfeature.name: speech_to_text_async
subfeature.description: Speech Recognition (or speech to text) can recognize and transcribe spoken words (voice),  that will be converted to text with or without diarization. It is also possible to filter profanity. The type of files allowed: mp3, wav, m4a. If convert_to_wav option is set to true, then you can transcribe any type of audio or video files.

name: google.audio.speech_to_text_async
description_content: Google Cloud Cloud Speech-to-Text enables developers to convert audio to text by applying powerful neural network models in an easy-to-use API. The API recognizes 120 languages and variants to support your global user base. You can enable voice command-and-control, transcribe audio from call centers, and more. It can process real-time streaming or prerecorded audio, using Google Cloud’s machine learning technology.

name: microsoft.audio.speech_to_text_async
description_content: Converts spoken audio to text for intuitive interaction Easily add real-time speech-to-text capabilities to your applications for scenarios like voice commands, conversation transcription, and call center log analysis. Tailor your speech recognition models to adapt to users’ speaking styles, expressions, and unique vocabularies, and to accommodate background noises, accents, and voice patterns.

subfeature.name: speech_to_text_async
subfeature.description: Speech Recognition (or speech to text) can recognize and transcribe spoken words (voice),  that will be converted to text with or without diarization. It is also possible to filter profanity. The type of files allowed: mp3, wav, m4a. If convert_to_wav option is set to true, then you can transcribe any type of audio or video files.

name: microsoft.audio.text_to_speech
description_content: Give natural voice to your apps Build smart apps and services that speak to users naturally with the Text to Speech service. Convert text to audio in near real time, tailor to change the speed of speech, pitch, volume, and more. Give your application a one-of-a-kind, recognizable brand voice using custom voice models. Simply record and upload training data, and the service will create a unique voice font tuned to your recording.

subfeature.name: text_to_speech
subfeature.description: Text-to-speech (TTS) system is a technology that enables the generation of high-quality audio from a written text while offering the flexibility to choose the desired voice, including male or female voices, and more. It utilizes advanced algorithms and neural networks to synthesize speech that closely resembles human speech, making it an ideal solution for a wide range of applications, including virtual assistants, audiobooks, and accessibility tools for people with visual impairments or reading difficulties. With TTS technology, it is possible to convert text into spoken words with remarkable accuracy and naturalness, providing an immersive and engaging listening experience.

description_content: Rev AI's asynchronous Speech-to-Text engine unlocks the power of voice for your business. Whether you're extracting insights from audio or transcribing content at scale, get it all done with a platform that is engineered for growth.

description_content: IBM Watson Watson Speech to Text technology enables fast and accurate speech transcription in multiple languages for a variety of use cases, including but not limited to customer self-service, agent assistance and speech analytics.

name: google.audio.text_to_speech
description_content: Google Cloud Cloud Text-to-Speech enables developers to synthesize natural-sounding speech with 100+ voices, available in multiple languages and variants. It applies DeepMind’s groundbreaking research in WaveNet and Google Cloud’s powerful neural networks to deliver the highest fidelity possible. As an easy-to-use API, you can create lifelike interactions with your users, across many applications and devices.

name: ibm.audio.text_to_speech
description_content: IBM Watson Watson Text to Speech gives your brand a voice, enabling you to improve customer experience and engagement by interacting with users in their own languages using any written text. name: amazon.audio.text_to_speech
description_content: Amazon Polly provides an API that enables you to quickly integrate speech synthesis into your application. You simply send the text you want converted into speech to the Amazon Polly API, and Amazon Polly immediately returns the audio stream to your application so your application can begin streaming it directly or store it in a standard audio file format, such as MP3.

name: amazon.audio.speech_to_text_async
description_content: Most speech recognition systems output a string of text without punctuation. Amazon Transcribe uses deep learning to add punctuation and formatting automatically, so that the output is more intelligible and can be used without any further editing.
